sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts"><x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>Generic Function inside Script Include : GPT</name><number>SCRIPT0001030</number><script><![CDATA[// Create a ServiceNow script include named getInstanceData with a function called getData that takes three input parameters - TableName (a string representing the table name), Fields (a comma-separated string of field names), and sysID (a string representing the record sysID). The function should return a JSON string with keys corresponding to the field names provided and values as the respective field values for the specified record.

// Additionally, provide sample inputs and expected outputs for two scenarios:

// Sample Input 1:
// TableName: sys_user
// Fields: title,email,user_name,manager
// sysID: 6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441

// Expected Output 1:
// {"title":"System Administrator","email":"admin@example.com","user_name":"admin","manager":"611c188a070131105295f19d7c1ed083"}

// Sample Input 2:
// TableName: incident
// Fields: short_description,description,state,category,number
// sysID: 22385d10076331d05295f19d7c1ed00f

// Expected Output 2:
// {"short_description":"Issue for 48c9eedcc0a8018b3fca079c261987d6","description":"","state":"2","category":"inquiry","number":"INC0010045"}

// Include a background script demonstrating the usage of the getData function by instantiating an object of the getInstanceData script include as below-


// var api=new getInstanceData();
// gs.info(api.getData('incident','short_description,description,state,category,number','22385d10076331d05295f19d7c1ed00f'))
// gs.info(api.getData('sys_user','title,email,user_name,manager','6816f79cc0a8016401c5a33be04be441'))]]></script><sys_class_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-01-11 07:45:54</sys_created_on><sys_id>0f1728a3072739105295f19d7c1ed00f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Generic Function inside Script Include : GPT</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Technical Repo" source="x_207260_technic_0">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Technical Repo">6362d051072ff5d05295f19d7c1ed08f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts_0f1728a3072739105295f19d7c1ed00f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-01-11 07:45:54</sys_updated_on></x_207260_technic_0_useful_scripts></record_update>
